songs.title: Dr. Dre Interlude
songs.lyrics:
[Dr. Dre]
Yeah, this is Dr. Dre
And this is for my nigga Too $hort
And I'm talking about three muthafuckin' decades in this rap game
Congratulations, my nigga
Now, on some real shit
Did you ever think that you would still be doing it like this?
Haha, yo, respect the muthafuckin' OG's
